text: The 2019 Formula 4 South East Asia Championship – Fueled by Petron was the fourth season of the Formula 4 South East Asia Championship. It began at the Sepang International Circuit on 5 April and ended at the same venue on 15 December. ==Drivers== The following drivers competed in the series. All cars were run by Malaysian team Meritus GP. All drivers used the Mygale–Renault M14-F4 chassis. {| |valign=top| {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! ! Driver !
